Hesham Issawi bụ onye edemede na onye nduzi Egypt American. A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri nke gunyere AmericanEast na Cairo Exit
A mụrụ Hesham n'Ijipt, mana ọ kwagara United States na 1990

Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ ihe nkiri, Columbia College Chicago ma gụsịa akwụkwọ na 1996. Ọ malitere ọrụ ya ebe ọ na-arụ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ telivishọn dị ka onye nchịkọta akụkọ n'ihe nkiri tupu ọ duzie obere isiokwu ole na ole nke ya

O dere ma duzie ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi nke afọ 2004, The Interrogation, nke meriri ihe nrite maka ihe nkiri dị nkenke kachasị mma na New York Film Festival na egwu kachasị mma na California Film Festival
N'afọ 2005, o so dee ma duzie ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi, T for Terrorist, merie ihe nkiri dị nkenke kacha mma na Boston na San Francisco Film Festivals.

Ihe nkiri izizi Hesham, AmericanEast, nke bú banyere nsogbu nke ndị Middle East na America post 9/11, nke Sayed Badreya, Tony Shalhoub na Sarah Shahi.E gosipụtara ihe nkiri ahụ na Dubai International Film Festival ma merie ihe nkiri kachasị mma na Madrid Film Festival, 2008.
Hesham bi n'etiti Cairo na Los Angeles kemgbe afọ 2010
N'ikwere na ihe nkiri nnwere onwe, o kpebiri ime Cairo Exit n'ala nna ya

E sere ihe nkiri ahụ na Cairo na-enweghị ikike n'ihi na nyocha jụrụ edemede ahụ. E gosipụtara ihe nkiri ahụ na Dubai International Film Festival, Tribeca Film Festival na ọtụtụ mmemme ndị ọzọ. Ihe nkiri ahụ meriri otu ihe nrite n'ọdịnihu na Filmfest München
Ihe nkiri ahụ ritere ihe nrite na Filmfest München na EuropeanIndependent film festival.
N'afọ 2015, ọ mechara ihe nkiri ọhụrụ ya, Price, nke e gosipụtara na Cairo International Film Festival ma wepụta ya na Egyptian Theater mgbe e mesịrị.
